comment: Missoula recently (last couple years) decided guns are no longer allowed in city limits! In Montana!
amr:
# ::snt Missoula recently (last couple years) decided guns are no longer allowed in city limits! In Montana!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (d / decide-01
            :ARG0 (s / state
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Missoula"))
            :ARG1 (a / allow-01
                  :ARG1 (g / gun)
                  :time (n2 / no-longer)
                  :location (l / limit-01
                        :ARG1 (c / city)))
            :time (r / recent
                  :op1 (c2 / couple
                        :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                              :quant 1
                              :unit (y / year)))))
      :snt2 (b / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 (e / event)
            :ARG2 (s2 / state
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Montana"))))

comment: Please do not use derogatory homophobic slurs and racial slurs.
amr:
# ::snt Please do not use derogatory homophobic slurs and racial slurs.
(u / use-01
      :polite +
      :polarity -
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (s / slur
                  :mod (h / homophobia))
            :op2 (s2 / slur
                  :mod (r / race))
            :mod (d / derogatory)))

comment: I can't change how you think but I think you can talk about how much you don't like their ideas without the homophobia.
amr:

(c / contrast-01
      :ARG1 (p / possible-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (c2 / change-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :manner-of (t2 / think-01
                              :ARG0 (y / you)))))
      :ARG2 (t3 / think-01
            :ARG0 ii
            :ARG1 (p2 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (t4 / talk-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (t5 / thing
                              :degree-of (d / dislike-01
                                    :ARG0 y
                                    :ARG1 (ii2 / idea
                                          :poss (t6 / they))))
                        :manner (h / homophobia
                              :polarity -)))))

comment: Please express your views respectfully and in a way that does not promote hatred for others. Racist and homophobic speech is unacceptable.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (e / express-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (v / view-02
                  :ARG0 y)
            :manner (a / and

                                    :mod o)))))
      :snt2 (p4 / possible-01
